Message:
Take out a nobleman’s daughter
and make it look like an accident.
That’s my next job.

Killing a young lady
still on the mend...
It must be something serious.

Maybe a love affair gone wrong,
or some other sordid reason...

No point in thinking too much.
All I have to do is carry out
the work I’ve been given.

I made my way into the manor
disguised as a butler,
and the nobleman’s daughter
introduced herself as “Evelyn.”

Such an irritating girl.
She kept prattling
on and on about things
I didn’t ask her about.

About how excited she was
to meet the manor’s new butler—
to meet me.

About the little bird
she received on her birthday.

“When I get better,
my parents will come
to take me back home.”

At those words,
a breath caught in my throat.

Don’t let her notice your unease.
Just spit out some trite words
that sound nice.
Agh, god dammit...

“I do hope the lord and lady
come back for you soon.”
I think I’m going to be sick.
